channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Email Encoder – Protect Email Addresses
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Email Encoder – Protect Email Addresses

item.title: CVE-2021-24599|2024-08-03T19:35:20.312Z -- unknown -- email%20encoder%20%E2%80%93%20protect%20email%20addresses
item.description: The Email Encoder – Protect Email Addresses WordPress plugin before 2.1.2 has an endpoint that requires no authentication and will render a user supplied value in the HTML response without escaping or sanitizing the data.
